invite.title: Gayyaci Mai Kasuwanci
invite.description1: Kun san mai kasuwanci wanda ke neman inganta ayyukansa? Raba Dott tare da su!
invite.description2: Dott yana taimakawa kasuwanci don sarrafa jadawalin aiki, gudanar da dangantakar abokan ciniki da kuma gudanar da biyan kuɗi - duk a cikin manhaja ɗaya mai sauƙi. Haɗin ku na iya adana sa'o'in aikin gudanarwa kowace mako.
invite.phoneHelperText: Haɗa lambar ƙasa (misali, +1 don Amurka, +234 don Najeriya)
invite.emailValidationError: Don Allah shigar da adireshin imel mai inganci.
invite.phoneValidationError: Don Allah shigar da lambar waya mai inganci.
invite.successMessage: An aika gayyata cikin nasara ta {{method}} zuwa {{recipient}}!
invite.errorMessage: Aika gayyata ya gaza. Don Allah sake gwadawa.
invite.networkError: Kuskuren hanyar sadarwa. Don Allah duba haɗin ku kuma sake gwadawa.
invite.emailMessage:
Sannu,

{{senderName}} ya gayyace ku don gwada Dott, kayan aiki cikakke don sauƙaƙe ayyukan kasuwanci.

Me yasa masu kasuwanci suke son Dott?
✓ Yin lissafin kuɗi ta atomatik da gudanar da biyan kuɗi
✓ Tsara jadawalin alƙawari da tunatarwar abokan ciniki
✓ Bin diddigin kayayyaki da gudanar da masu siyarwa
✓ Sarrafa biyan albashi da rahotannin haraji
✓ Fahimtar kasuwanci da bincike

Fara gwajin kyauta yau:
https://dottapps.com

Mafi kyau,
Ƙungiyar Dott
invite.whatsappMessage:
Sannu 👋

{{senderName}} ya gayyace ku don gwada Dott, kayan aiki cikakke don sauƙaƙe ayyukan kasuwanci.

✓ Yin lissafin kuɗi ta atomatik
✓ Tsara jadawalin alƙawari
✓ Gudanar da kayayyaki
✓ Sarrafa biyan albashi
✓ Binciken kasuwanci

Fara gwajin kyauta: https://dottapps.com

importExport.title: Shigo da/Fitar da Bayanai
importExport.description: Matsawa bayanan kasuwancin ku zuwa cikin da daga Dott ba tare da matsala ba. Shigo da su daga spreadsheets ko wasu software na lissafin kudi, kuma fitar da bayanan ku a nau'uka daban-daban. Mai yin taswirar filayen mu mai ikon AI yana sanya shigo da bayanai cikin sauri da daidai.
importExport.comingSoon: Yana Zuwa Nan ba da jimawa ba

import.title: Shigo da Bayanai
import.description: Kawo bayanan da kuke da su zuwa Dott daga Excel, QuickBooks ko wasu wurare.

aiFeature.title: Sabon Fasali: Mai Yin Taswirar Bayanai mai Ikon AI
aiFeature.description: Tsarin taswirar filayen mu mai hankali yana amfani da Claude AI don daidaita filayen bayanan ku ta atomatik da tsarin bayanan Dott, yana sanya shigo da su cikin sauri da daidai fiye da kowane lokaci.
